data.text:
EPISODE 1

24 Hours

The doctors of County General Hospital in Chicago experience a difficult 24 hours in the series permiere.

1 hr 22 min Â· Sep 19, 1994 TV-14

EPISODE 2

Day One

On Carter's first full day, the ER is overwhelmed when it is flooded by a tour group and a wedding party that both contracted food poisoning at the same restaurant.

44 min Â· Sep 22, 1994 TV-14

EPISODE 4

Hit and Run

Drs. Langworthy and Benton fail to revive a teenager injured in a traffic accident, and Carter is given the responsibility of notifying his parents.

44 min Â· Oct 6, 1994 TV-14

EPISODE 5

Into That Good Night

Drs. Greene and Lewis treat a man who will not survive the night without a heart transplant. Dr. Benton treats a liquor store clerk for his third gunshot wound in a month.

43 min Â· Oct 13, 1994 TV-14
